cp:coreProperties.dc:creator: Marcus Vollmer
cp:coreProperties.dc:description: This application will record audio signals from an input device. During the record there is a gradually plot of the immediate signal and the spectrogram. The display length as well as the frequency window are adjustable. Afterwards you are able to save the record as a wav-file, play the record, open the wave form and sprectrogram as figures or start a new record.
cp:coreProperties.dc:title: LiveRecording
